name: HiddenRoomz
description:
HiddenRoomz is a short puzzle platformer about solving puzzles to find hidden doors that lead to the next room.

If you find any bugs please report them to kroyisyork20@gmail.com

Currently on Windows ONLY - An android version is coming soon.

How To Download (Windows):

1.) Download the given .zip file

2.) Locate the downloaded .zip file

3.) Double-Click "HiddenRoomz.exe".
